title: Is the West normalising mental health overdiagnosis?
description: The brain is a problem-solving organ. It has created the modern world in all its technological complexity. But our hunger for tidy explanations and coherence in an infinitely complicated world can also be dangerous. These days, we are too often trying to solv…
